short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to find translations in youtube streams.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Alright, fine, I make it for Vtubers.

If you love watching streams or Vtubers from other countries, you know that feeling of not knowing what they are talking about. Thankfully sometimes there will be some nice guy doing the translation in chat, but chat scrolls fast, I mean really fast. So I made this simple extension to help you subtitle those translator's message!
